column1: Mbappe's goal late in the match secured the victory for France
column2: who had a 2-1 win over Denmark at Stadium 974. After a first half that lacked finishing
column3: both teams came alive in the second half
column4: with Mbappe connecting with Hernandez to score the opener. Denmark responded shortly after
column6: who set up Christensen to equalise. However
column8: Griezmann's cross was met by Mbappe to give France the win and secure their place in the knockout stages. Denmark must now beat Australia in their final match to progress.
